trans-unit.source: Provides information about input from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> to get information about the input the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> receives when the user moves the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput>以获取有关输入的信息<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>接收当用户将触笔。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，用于检查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>笔势。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>璹綷<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，从应用程序线程调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
The stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
The following example demonstrates how to change the stylus points in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何更改中的触笔点<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that restricts ink to a certain area, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>墨迹限制到特定区域，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概述。

trans-unit.source: The data to pass to the application thread.
Subscribes to the application thread's corresponding stylus methods.
The pen's input is routed to an element's <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: 笔输入路由到元素的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>笔线程上。

trans-unit.source: Because accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: 由于无法对笔线程执行准确的命中测试，某些元素偶尔可能会收到适用于其他元素的触笔输入。

trans-unit.source: If you need to be sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要以确保正确路由输入，正在执行的操作之前，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>的方法中，在钢笔线程上发生的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> to subscribe to the application thread's method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了在何处拜访<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>订阅应用程序线程的方法。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in this method
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>在此方法

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to this method
trans-unit.target: 璹綷此方法

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，用于检查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>笔势。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>璹綷<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，从应用程序线程调用。

trans-unit.source: The stylus points to pass to the application thread.
Sets the stylus points that are passed to the application thread.

Events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> set by <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.SetStylusPoints%2A> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>，可以获取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.SetStylusPoints%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to change the stylus points in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何更改中的触笔点<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that restricts ink to a certain area, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>墨迹限制到特定区域，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概述。

trans-unit.source: for setting the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置触笔接触点。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current stylus device.
The identifier of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的标识符<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures that the stylus points collected are from the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例将确保收集触笔接触点均来自同一<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of the bigger example in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自中较大的示例<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current tablet device.
The identifier of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的标识符<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time at which the input occurred.
The time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 输入的发生时间。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.Timestamp%2A> property is the value of the <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property at which the stylus event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.Timestamp%2A>属性是值的<xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>发生触笔事件的属性。
